item.title: A New Look for the EH Data Portal
item.description: We’ve made a few changes If you’re a regular to the Environment & Health Data Portal, then you may notice that we’ve made a few changes to our home page. We’ve kept most of the Portal’s functions the same, but we’ve rearranged things, and want to tell you about them. Before raw HTML within. After raw HTML within. Why’d we make these changes? Well, for a few reasons:
